General.Name: LED iBond International AS
General.Description: LED iBond International A/S provides LED lighting solutions in Denmark. The company's products include Gracy, a lighting fixture with integrated LED lights; Tracy, an LED linear lighting solutions for indoor and outdoor spaces; Shelly, the illuminated smart shelves; and The Plane, a luminaire design that incorporates a magnetic suspension system. It offers lighting solutions for carports, parking garages, service stations, car washes, elevators, construction trailers, office spaces, libraries, kitchen, garden houses, hardware store DIY, nurseries, greenhouses, moving gutters, trolleys, containers, in-store mini-farms, and cannabis farms. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Horsholm, Denmark.
